DOC.brief_summary: The objective study assess performance safety formulation antiproliferative agent , sirolimus coat modified Bx VELOCITY Balloon-Expandable Stent mount Raptor Over The Wire ( OTW ) Stent Delivery System ( SDS ) patient de novo coronary artery lesion .
DOC.brief_title: FIM-NL - First-in-Man Study ( Netherlands Part ) With Sirolimus Coated Modified BX Velocity Stent
DOC.detailed_description: This single center , non-randomized study . Patients meet eligibility criterion treat sirolimus coat modify Bx VELOCITY Balloon-Expandable Stent mount Raptor OTW SDS . Patients follow five year post-procedure , patient repeat angiography 6 month , 18 month , 48 month .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Diagnosis angina pectoris define Canadian Cardiovascular Society Classification ( CCS ) positive ischemia study ; 2 . Single de novo lesion require treatment major native coronary artery ; 3 . Target lesion < =18mm length ( visual estimate ) ; 4 . Target lesion > =3.0mm < =3.5mm diameter ( visual estimate ) ; 5 . Target lesion stenosis > 50 % < 100 % ( visual estimate ) ; 1 . A Qwave nonQwave myocardial infarction within precede 72 hour unless CK CKMB enzymes back normal ; 2 . Unprotected leave main coronary disease > =50 % stenosis ; 3 . Have ostial target lesion ; 4 . Angiographic evidence thrombus within target lesion ; 5 . Calcified lesion successfully predilated ; 6 . Ejection fraction < =30 % ; 7 . Target lesion involve bifurcation ( either stenosis main vessel major branch stenosis major branch ) ; 8 . Totally occluded vessel ;
